About Me

Hi! My name is Elias Fuentes and I am a self-taught web developer based in Las Vegas, NV. My path towards web development is long; I was a Music major in college but opted to get a degree in Accounting. Realizing that I could not utilize my creative side, I sought for new career paths. I discovered that web development sparks both my creative and logical sides.

Projects

Guitar Simplified Academy

HTML5 & CSS3

    Semantic HTML and vanilla CSS3 front-end design of an online guitar learning web application. Utilized flexbox to lay out, align and distribute space among items in containers. Implemented grid layout to easily align elements into columns and rows instead of using tables. Contains media queries with breakpoints to make the web page mobile responsive.

Beast Strength

HTML5, Tailwind CSS, JavaScript, Express.js, Node.js, & Parcel

    Full-Stack JavaScript e-commerce project. This e-commerce website allows users to download products and purchase products utilizing Stripe API for payment processes. Utilizes Sendinblue API which deals with email sending, and managing a database of contacts and lists of which customers have bought which items.
